Welcome to CashSmash where you grab the goods and not the helpful moles.

The moles will dig through the dirt and throw up a prize for you to grab.

Occationally they will peek out the hole to check on you.

DON'T BOP THEM!!

They will hold a grudge and deduct from your score.

The goal is 300 points per round. If you don't get it, you have 4 extra chances to advance.

Now go grab some cash!
